name: THE SHRiNK Season Two
description: In THE SHRiNK you play as a 23-year-old who lacks motivation. He lives in a house full of women in a small town called Woodsville. Alex, (default name) continues his adventures in Woodsville with Season Two of THE SHRiNK. Pick up where you left off with Season One and find out what ails the town to find a solution... Or perhaps use that to your advantage.
